name: A Murder of Crows (itch)
description:
You’ve been called to solve a murder in the midst of a noir Cawtham City. As a private investigator, this should be no problem for you—but it would be a whole lot easier if you weren’t a handful of crows in a trench coat. Find clues, battle mobsters, and solve the mystery!

  • Play as Crowley Corvo—a handful of crime-fighting crows in a trench coat
  • Investigate a murder by interviewing NPCs 
  • Search for clues
  • Combat the city’s underground mob
  • Solve the case!
